name: Reduce, use Renewables - then Offset your CO2 footprint on Gnosis Chain
description:
In this workshop we will walk through with participants how they can offset their flights minting #YCo2 carbon credits directly from solar rooftops on UK Schools - a limited edition high-resolution carbon credit sale to showcase the web3 potential. • We will discuss digital carbon, distributed community validation, open data and protocol, limitations when connecting real world assets today, including GDPR compliance & confidentiality. • We will explain the issue of “additionality” - and how it becomes a non-issue using smart contracts composability. • We’ll debate the value of avoiding carbon emissions and replacing fossil fueled power through solar power, how to price carbon credits that reward with more solar. Required: • Metamask (or other wallet) connected to Gnosis Chain. 

Workshops will not be streamed or recorded. It will be held in English and no translation to Portuguese will be provided.
